general.description:
This is the main waypoint for the so-called "ghost ships" heading from Irilia space to the Aragwedyr planet of Amarynn-Woodsfield. It lies near Thim Humae and both stations mutually protect themselves.
Under Irilia protection by treaty, but administered by Free Adrimai, the station proudly wears the color of the Dri'h on its hull and flag.
general.bar: The bar is filled with Rithai, most of them Free Adrimai
